metadata.name: shunrei_NFT#002
metadata.description:
japanese calligrapher

In addition to calligraphy, I am also involved in a wide range of activities in Japan and abroad, such as writing logos, naming book, tatoo design, and more.
I hope that the fusion of calligraphy and digital technology will bring a new charm to calligraphy and make it more appealing to many people.

【syunrei_NFT#002】
The meaning of this letter is beauty.

【日本限定、どちらかの特典を受けられます】
InstagramDMへご連絡下さい。

・当NFT作品の現物入手（額装あり）
    ※1次購入者限定特典です。
    ※半紙に墨の作品になります。
  
・書いてほしい文字のリクエスト権利
    ※ご購入から30日間以内に1作品のみ
    ※1名1回限り

【Benefit】
Please contact us at InstagramDM.

・The right to order letters of your choice
  ※Limited to one time per person
  ※Expiration date is within 30 days of purchase
